Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Conrad Beijing places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Chaoyang Theater and CCTV Headquarters. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Green T. House Art Gallery and Yashow Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 289 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features concierge services, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and conference space.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Conrad Beijing places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Chaoyang Theater and CCTV Headquarters. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Green T. House Art Gallery and Yashow Market.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chaoyang Theater - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Green T. House Art Gallery - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Yashow Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Nali Patio - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
CCTV Headquarters - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Workers Stadium - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Dong Yue Miao - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
National Agricultural Exhibition Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
China World Trade Center - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Yintai Centre - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Ritan Park - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Chaoyang Park - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Silk Street Market - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Poly Theater - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Dongsishitiao Bridge - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Conrad Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 20.5 km / 12.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
